changes: Now using styled-components version 6 internally.
Dark theme support.
The component prop interface now correctly accepts all native properties in React.
The openLabel and closeLabel props now also accept slots.
Fixed a bug that caused the accordion to apply transition: all to its content.
Updated internal dependencies.
Improved the way the accordion calculates the height of its content in Firefox (113).
Fixed a bug where the accordion would incorrectly calculate the height of its content in Firefox (113).
Updated internal dependencies.
Added support for dark theme.
Updated internal dependencies.
Improved the detection of changing heights inside the accordion content, which should avoid the accordion not opening properly.
Moved the aria-expanded attribute to the button that open/closes the accordion.
Fixed an issue that caused the content of the accordion to still be tabbable when the accordion was closed. This fix applies only to the normal accordion, not the overflow accordion.
Simplified the structure of the component. This causes a minor change in the DOM structure, but should not affect the styling of the component.
Fixed an issue that caused the accordion to trigger rerenders when it was not supposed to. This caused, among other things, CSS animations to rerun.
Reduced bundle size by improving the way icons are imported and used.
The component config has been moved into each component.
Updated dependencies on internal packages.
Fixed an issue with calculating the height of the content when there is margin on the content.
Fixed an issue where content with display: absolute sometimes caused the closed accordion to take up too much space.
Added support for React 18.
Use @elvia/elvis-component-wrapper@^3.0.1. This fixes an issue where the component would not properly unmount when used as webcomponent.
Overflow accordion no longer has a fixed max height, instead using the actual height of the content.
The padding above the accordion content for normal accordion is no longer animated when opening and closing the accordion.
Accordion now takes 100% of width.
Use @elvia/elvis-component-wrapper@^3.0.0.
Use @elvia/elvis-toolbox@5.0.0
Update dependency @elvia/elvis-toolbox to 4.0.0
Fix version dependency on @elvia/elvis-icon.
Added spacingBelowContent prop that can be used on overflow accordion.
Upgrade to toolbox v2.0.0
Added typography prop, where wanted typography can be passed in.
New prop spacingAboveContent that allows to pass in custom padding between accordion button and content.
Padding between accordion button and content is now 8px.
Added onOpen and onClose event.
Added prop buttonOnly for having the accordion button alone without label and content, that can be used next to something custom.
Added the props isOpen, isFullWidth, isStartAligned, openDetailText and closeDetailText.
Reworked the way the component is declared as a module, and how types are exported for React.
Added support for native events in React.
Update slot logic to support components inside components better.
Fixed React version dependency.
Added new property "overflowHeight" allowing users to decide how much content to diplay before opening the  accordion.
Fixed an issue causing problems for events in non-React environments for props with falsy values. This  update bumps the dependency on @elvia/elvis-component-wrapper.

Added two new props: openAriaLabel and closeAriaLabel. By default the button to open/close the accordion  will now have an aria-label corresponding to the openLabel/closeLabel props, however this can be overwritten  with the new props. If no label is provided the aria-labels default to "Åpne" and "Lukk".
Now using correct type for webcomponent wrapper for better internal IntelliSense.
Now using elvis-icon package for internal icons.
Added inlineStyle and className props
Added aria-label for open/close button
Updated dependencies
Refactoring
Updated tokens declarations
Updated and added more tests
Now using elvis-colors package for colors.
Improved type safety.
Web component wrapper fix.
Improved type safety.
Defined color for accordion button, and set background to transparent to fix error on IOS15.
Bug fixes for displaying of content in the accordion. This may change some of the accordion content layout.
The web component accordion will now take up 100% width, this was the default in React. This might be  breaking for some projects.
First version of Accordion
